TopicTitle: K.S.S Vulture (Hit and run assault frigate)

Articles.Content:
Just some Picks of my assault frigate i made witch i put in orbit using cheats (yes im lazy and and very bad when it comes to rocketry and SSTOs in general). This ship is currently armed with four oerlikon-millenium cannons and 2 howitzers. The ship only has a crew of four and a little hangar for maby a couple of small shuttle crafts. I didnt bother taking picks of the ship in orbit cuz of the darkness of space, when the hangar offers much better lighting to showcase the ship .

So here are some picks of the ship.

And yes the big sticks in the side of the ship are supposed to be the ships main charge laser cannons but cuz of ksp i had to use howitzers instead (in the nose next to the antennaes) and leave the main guns there just for show .

And as i said i used cheats to get it to orbit since i built this ship for looks not so much to actually make it work.

So i hope you enjoyed looking at this frigate that i made .
